properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 5 at 3:21PM EST until February 7 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to noon EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO NOON EST FRIDAY
